mapper.insert: insert into payment_detail (paydetailcode, deductcode, paycode, deductpay, usestatus) values (#{payDetailCode},#{deductCode},#{payCode}, nvl(#{deductPay, jdbcType=VARCHAR},null), nvl(#{useStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR},null)
mapper.select: select paydetailcode, deductcode, paycode, deductpay, usestatus from payment_detail
select paydetailcode, deductcode, paycode, deductpay, usestatus from payment_detail where paydetailcode = #{payDetailCode}

select paydetailcode, pd.deductcode, pd.paycode, deductpay, pd.usestatus,dpd.deprostatus ,to_char(p.payday,'yyyy-MM-dd') payday from payment_detail pd, de_product_div dpd,payment p where pd.deductcode=dpd.deductcode and p.paycode=pd.paycode and pd.paycode=#{paycode} and pd.usestatus=1
